caption.p:
Distribution of the optimized probability ( α
i ) of each model to be included in the constrained ensemble. The plotted data are obtained by optimizing α
i after starting from 100 different initial sets. Blue dots represent the minimum and maximum values; lines reach the 5th and 95th percentiles; and boxes cover the interquartile range. Red dots represent the mean probabilities that are used to sample the constrained ensemble.
